mapper.insert: INSERT INTO produce.produce_device (deviceIdentification, deviceName, onlineStatus, activationState, createTime, activeTime, enableStatus, deviceAddress, produceId) VALUES (#{deviceIdentification}, #{deviceName}, #{onlineStatus}, #{activationState}, #{createTime}, #{activeTime}, #{enableStatus}, #{deviceAddress}, #{produceId})
mapper.update: UPDATE produce.produce_device SET deviceIdentification = #{deviceIdentification}, deviceName = #{deviceName}, onlineStatus = #{onlineStatus}, activationState = #{activationState}, createTime = #{createTime}, activeTime = #{activeTime}, enableStatus = #{enableStatus}, deviceAddress = #{deviceAddress}, produceId = #{produceId} WHERE deviceId = #{deviceId} and isDelete = 0
mapper.select: SELECT deviceId, deviceIdentification, deviceName, onlineStatus, activationState, DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS createTime, DATE_FORMAT(activeTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS activeTime, enableStatus, deviceAddress, produceId FROM produce.produce_device WHERE deviceId = #{deviceId} and isDelete = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE produce.produce_device,produce.produce_data set produce_device.isDelete = 1, produce_data.isDelete = 1 WHERE produce_device.deviceId = #{deviceId} and produce_data.deviceId = #{deviceId}
mapper.select: SELECT functionId, functionType, functionName, fieldName, transportType, functionDescription, produceId FROM produce.produce_function WHERE produceId = #{produceId} and isDelete = 0
SELECT dataId, deviceId, functionId, dataString, createTime from produce.produce_data WHERE deviceId = #{deviceId} and functionId = #{functionId} and isDelete = 0
SELECT deviceName from produce.produce_device WHERE produceId = #{produceId} and isDelete = 0
SELECT deviceName from produce.produce_device WHERE produceId = #{produceId} and deviceId != #{anotherId}
